instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2915-B bootbar for 75% and reboot
threads.message:
When I start the MacBook it show the Apple logo than the bootbar for 75%, then I get a blank screen. After that the system turned off and repeat the same again.
Or is this due the graphic BGA.
Any suggestion where to start ?

threads.title: 820-2915-B bootbar for 75% and reboot
threads.message:
Usually GPU issue.
Machine crashes when starts to load dedicated graphics driver.
Disable GPU and try again.

threads.title: 820-2915-B bootbar for 75% and reboot
threads.message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 86943, member: 682"]
Usually GPU issue.
Machine crashes when starts to load dedicated graphics driver.
Disable GPU and try again.
[/QUOTE]
Ok i will thanks
